## Type of Change
<!-- Mark the relevant option with an 'x' -->

- [ ] **Bug fix** (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] **New feature** (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] **Breaking change** (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] **Documentation update** (documentation changes only)
- [ ] **Refactoring** (internal change, no user-visible impact)
- [ ] **Performance improvement** (non-breaking change that improves performance)
- [ ] **Test addition** (adding or updating tests)

## Checklist
<!-- Mark with 'x' when completed -->

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (`cargo fmt`)
- [ ] My code passes linter (`cargo clippy -- -D warnings`)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] I have updated examples/index if applicable
